about_the_game:
Toy support says it all!
You now can enjoy an exciting session of Reveal Your Monster with a spicy extra. Have your personal bluetooth enabled toy to cheer for you more and more, while you click your way through revelation or while exploring the gallery of your past achievements.

ATTENTION: Please check whether your toy is supported before buying. The link is found under Online Manual.

Features:
  • Connect bluetooth enabled toy
  • Select which toy to use (even multiples) if more than one is detected
  • Enjoy the game with all new "haptic feedback"
  • Use toys with either vibration OR rotation (Note: linear motion is not supported as of now)

content_descriptors.notes: This DLC provides the possibility to connect toys in order to provide haptic feedback during gameplay.
